description: Details required by condition 2 (submission of details - (a) all new skirting and cornices; (b) all new fireplaces (inserts and surrounds); (c) notwithstanding the approved drawings, a full door schedule showing details of doors to be retained and those to be replaced (all new doors to be 4 panelled recessed Victorian style in sold timber); (d) all new lighting; (e) tanking system to vaults; (f) elevation drawings of proposed fitted kitchen units (with relationship to cornices and skirting boards); (g) windows schedule of those to be retained and those to be replaced; (h) all new service runs (internal and external details) including plumbing runs for kitchens; (i) details of front steps) of Listed Building Consent LB/19/06825 (Change of use from Class Sui Generis (houses of multiple occupation) to creation of 8 self-contained residential units (6 x studio and 2 x 1 bed) with associated internal alterations (Class C3))
